transfer.title: Airport & Intercity Transfers
transfer.subtitle: Reliable and comfortable transfer services
transfer.fixedPriceNote: Fixed price for this route type
transfer.noVehiclesMessage: We couldn't find any vehicles matching your requirements. Please modify your search criteria.
transfer.whyChooseUsSubtitle: Experience the difference with our premium transfer services
transfer.punctualityText: We value your time and ensure punctual pickups and drop-offs for all our services.
transfer.safetyText: Professional drivers and well-maintained vehicles to ensure your safety during the journey.
transfer.comfortText: Luxurious vehicles equipped with premium amenities for a comfortable travel experience.
transfer.affordabilityText: Competitive rates with no hidden fees, ensuring excellent value for premium service.
transfer.intraCityInfo: Intra-city transfers: Base rate plus distance
transfer.intercityInfo: Intercity transfers: Lower per-km rate for longer distances
transfer.airportInfo: Airport transfers: Same pricing as intra-city transfers

chauffeur.title: Chauffeur-Driven Vehicle Rental
chauffeur.subtitle: Premium vehicles with professional drivers
chauffeur.hoursOfAvailabilityText: Our chauffeur services are available 24/7, including holidays and weekends.
chauffeur.professionalChauffeursText: All our drivers are professionally trained, multilingual, and have extensive local knowledge.
chauffeur.transparentPricingText: No hidden fees. All taxes, chauffeur gratuity, and fuel costs are included in your rate.
chauffeur.selectVehicleText: Select a vehicle to make a reservation. All prices shown are hourly rates.
chauffeur.noVehiclesText: There are no vehicles available for this service type. Please contact us for custom arrangements.
chauffeur.needHelp: Need Help With Your Chauffeur Service?
chauffeur.needHelpText: Our team is ready to assist you with your transportation needs. Contact us for a personalized quote.

rental.title: Hourly & Daily Chauffeur Service
rental.description: Book a luxury vehicle with a professional driver for however long you need. Perfect for business meetings, city exploration, or special events.

wedding.title: Wedding Car Service
wedding.description: Make your special day even more memorable with our premium wedding car service. Elegantly decorated vehicles and professional chauffeurs.
benefits: Multiple vehicle options for the wedding party

corporate.title: Corporate Car Service
corporate.description: Impress your clients and provide premium transportation for your executive team with our corporate chauffeur services.

vehicleDescriptions.renault-trafic: Comfortable and spacious minivan perfect for small groups and families with ample luggage space.
vehicleDescriptions.mercedes-s-class: Luxury sedan with premium amenities, perfect for business executives and VIP guests seeking the ultimate comfort.
vehicleDescriptions.mercedes-vito-tourer: Spacious luxury van with premium comfort, perfect for families or small groups traveling together.
vehicleDescriptions.mercedes-sprinter: Premium passenger van with comfortable seating for larger groups, ideal for airport transfers and group tours.
vehicleDescriptions.mercedes-sprinter-vip: Ultimate luxury VIP minibus with exclusive interior, perfect for executive groups and VIP transportation.
